page.title: 09Tempsford Traffic.
page.content: As the second part of the traffic survey we recorded the flow of traffic through the village and traffic which turned off the A1 for Tempsford and visa-versa. {CHURCH END Cars Bikes Buses Van Peds. 21 7 0 3 7{ { } {STATION END }24 0 0 7 3 {ENTRY { {STATION END }26 0 0 7 0 {EXIT Obviously movement of traffic and people in any one given hour would be dependent on many factors time of day, weather, bus times etc,but it would appear that should all exits off the A1 in the area be closed this would create great problems for Tempsford and its inhabitants.
